title: Organizational Development Practical Competency Enhancement: News-Based Corporate Risk Identification Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can classify corporate risk types in news texts with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can explain methods to improve model performance in small-sample datasets using prompt learning techniques.
Learners can connect output results of BERT-based risk identification systems in simulation environments to actual corporate response strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
